lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s Jeff Long was hired yesterday to replace Arkansas’ longtime athletic director, Frank Broyles, who spent a half-century with the Razorbacks. Long, Pitt’s A.D. since 2003, will serve as an adviser before taking over Jan. 1, Chancellor John White said.
